overview: A superb collection of favorite operatic moments from the master of opera, Guiseppe Verdi. This compilation features the extraordinary talents of Jos√© Carreras, Nicola Martinucci, Kiri Te Kanawa, Vladimir Atlantov and many more, in spectacular productions filmed at the Arena di Verona, Teatro alla Scala, Milan and The Royal Opera, Convent Garden.
title: Verdi Favorites
